item.title: First shiny app
item.description: Here you can find my fist shiny app try.

item.title: Primo rmd
item.description: Primo post 0. Preparatory work library(shiny) library(tidyverse) library(rio) path <- "https://github.com/n-oise/kidiq/blob/main/kidiq.dta?raw=true" 1. Load the data in R Import the data and check if they have been correctly loaded: kidiq <- import(path) head(kidiq) ## kid_score mom_hs mom_iq mom_work mom_age ## 1 65 1 121.11753 4 27 ## 2 98 1 89.36188 4 25 ## 3 85 1 115.44316 4 27 ## 4 83 1 99.44964 3 25 ## 5 115 1 92.
